ViewObject.Name: XxGamMaCurrencyLovVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: (SELECT DISTINCT fct.CURRENCY_CODE CURRENCY_CODE ,fct.NAME CURRENCY_NAME ,fct.DESCRIPTION CURRENCY_DESC FROM PER_ALL_ASSIGNMENTS_F paaf ,HR_ALL_ORGANIZATION_UNITS_TL ou ,PER_PAY_BASES ppb ,FND_CURRENCIES fc ,FND_CURRENCIES_TL fct WHERE 1=1 AND paaf.ORGANIZATION_ID = ou.ORGANIZATION_ID AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) BETWEEN paaf.effective_start_date AND paaf.effective_end_date AND SYSDATE BETWEEN NVL(start_date_active, sysdate) and nvl(end_date_active,sysdate+1) AND paaf.PRIMARY_FLAG = 'Y' AND paaf.ASSIGNMENT_TYPE = 'E' AND paaf.PAY_BASIS_ID = ppb.PAY_BASIS_ID AND ou.NAME like '99%' AND ou.LANGUAGE = USERENV('LANG') AND fct.language = USERENV('LANG') AND fct.CURRENCY_CODE = fc.CURRENCY_CODE AND fc.enabled_flag = 'Y' AND fct.CURRENCY_CODE = TRIM (SUBSTR(ppb.NAME,length(ppb.NAME)-3,length(ppb.NAME))) AND XXGAM_AP_MOD_ANT_UTILS2_PKG.get_currency_Internat ='99' --ORDER BY fct.NAME UNION SELECT currenciestl.currency_code CURRENCY_CODE, currenciestl.name CURRENCY_NAME, currenciestl.description CURRENCY_DESC FROM fnd_currencies_tl currenciestl, fnd_currencies currencies WHERE 1 = 1 AND currenciestl.language = USERENV('LANG') AND currenciestl.CURRENCY_CODE = currencies.CURRENCY_CODE AND currencies.enabled_flag = 'Y' AND SYSDATE BETWEEN NVL(start_date_active, sysdate) and nvl(end_date_active,sysdate+1) AND currenciestl.currency_code in ('MXN','EUR','USD') AND XXGAM_AP_MOD_ANT_UTILS2_PKG.get_currency_Internat <>'99' ) order by 1
